text:
Augustine Philip Mahiga (28 August 1945 – 1 May 2020) was a Tanzanian CCM politician. He was the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Tanzania from 2015 to 2019. He was the Permanent Representative to the United Nations from 2003 to 2010. He was born in Dar es Salaam, Tanganyika.
Mahiga died on 1 May 2020 in Dodoma, Tanzania of a short-illness, aged 74.
